# BusyBox
BusyBox is licensed under 
[GNU GPLv2](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html).
The BusyBox binary is distributed with this suite of tools. No modifications 
have been made. The corresponding source code for the version of BusyBox
distributed with this suite may be found 
[at this link](https://busybox.net/downloads/busybox-1.36.1.tar.bz2).

The version of the source code used to compile the binary is 1.36.1. The 
`.config` file used to build the binary can be found in this directory as well.

Note: If redistributing this code, please keep this notice here. Otherwise, you 
may not be satisfying the legal obligations of the BusyBox GPLv2 license.
